phrases.text: Cặp bù kè chấm muối mè
phrases.english: Shrimp paste dipped in sesame salt

facts: Bù kè (shrimp paste) is a fermented condiment common in Vietnamese cuisine
Muối mè (sesame salt) is a traditional dipping mixture
culturalContext.musicalContext: Opening phrase establishing the food theme

phrases.text: Ăn với xôi ăn bình vôi phỏng miệng
phrases.english: Eat with sticky rice, eat betel lime burns the mouth

culturalContext.description: Traditional Vietnamese eating customs and betel chewing
facts: Xôi (sticky rice) is a staple food often eaten with savory accompaniments
Bình vôi refers to the lime paste used in betel nut chewing, a traditional practice
The phrase warns about the caustic nature of lime paste
culturalContext.musicalContext: Middle phrase describing eating practices and their effects
